name: Resolute (109Dev)
description:
The Lattice Grid above an endless void is where you will meet your demise

Resolute is a brutal twin-stick arcade shooter that takes place on a 3x3 grid of claustrophobic platforms.  Dodge and weave between colorful bullet hell from a variety of tough enemies and survive as many waves as possible to reach your new high-score. 

Sessions for the average player shouldn't last longer than 10 minutes making Resolute the perfect coffee break arcade game. 

Controls: 

Move around with WASD, Left click to shoot, Right click to use temporary shield, use 'E' to use the teleporters. 

Built by:

Kinix

Pinesofchaos
